translations.zh-hant: @@untranslatable_placeholder_58cfcc64

segments.source_content: # Static methods

translations.zh-hant: # 靜態方法

segments.source_content: Static methods are not part of the plugin instance—they are attached to the constructor function. These methods are used to validate and normalize the plugin options and theme config, which are then used as constructor parameters to initialize the plugin instance.

translations.zh-hant: 靜態方法不屬於插件實例——它們附加在構造函數上。這些方法用於驗證和標準化插件選項與主題配置，這些參數隨後會作為構造函數參數來初始化插件實例。

segments.source_content: ## `validateOptions({options, validate})` {#validateOptions}

translations.zh-hant: ## `validateOptions({options, validate})` {#validateOptions}

segments.source_content: Returns validated and normalized options for the plugin. This method is called before the plugin is initialized. You must return the options since they will be passed to the plugin during initialization.

translations.zh-hant: 返回經過驗證和標準化的插件選項。此方法在插件初始化前調用。您必須返回選項，因為它們將在初始化時傳遞給插件。

segments.source_content: ### `options` {#options}

translations.zh-hant: ### `options` {#options}

segments.source_content: `validateOptions` is called with `options` passed to plugin for validation and normalization.

translations.zh-hant: `validateOptions` 會接收傳遞給插件進行驗證和標準化的 `options`。

segments.source_content: ### `validate` {#validate}

translations.zh-hant: ### `validate` {#validate}

segments.source_content: `validateOptions` is called with `validate` function which takes a **[Joi](https://www.npmjs.com/package/joi)** schema and options as the arguments, returns validated and normalized options. `validate` will automatically handle error and validation config.

translations.zh-hant: `validateOptions` 會接收 `validate` 函數，該函數接受 **[Joi](https://www.npmjs.com/package/joi)** 模式和選項作為參數，返回經過驗證和標準化的選項。`validate` 會自動處理錯誤和驗證配置。

segments.source_content:
:::tip

[Joi](https://www.npmjs.com/package/joi) is recommended for validation and normalization of options.

To avoid mixing Joi versions, use `const {Joi} = require("@docusaurus/utils-validation")`

:::

translations.zh-hant:
:::tip

推薦使用 [Joi](https://www.npmjs.com/package/joi) 進行選項的驗證和標準化。

為避免混用 Joi 版本，請使用 `const {Joi} = require("@docusaurus/utils-validation")`

:::

segments.source_content: If you don't use **[Joi](https://www.npmjs.com/package/joi)** for validation you can throw an Error in case of invalid options and return options in case of success.

translations.zh-hant: 如果您不使用 **[Joi](https://www.npmjs.com/package/joi)** 進行驗證，可以在選項無效時拋出錯誤，並在成功時返回選項。
@@untranslatable_placeholder_cb57d798

segments.source_content: In TypeScript, you can also choose to export this as a separate named export.

translations.zh-hant: 在 TypeScript 中，您也可以選擇將其作為單獨的命名導出。
@@untranslatable_placeholder_4795a13d

segments.source_content: ## `validateThemeConfig({themeConfig, validate})` {#validateThemeConfig}

translations.zh-hant: ## `validateThemeConfig({themeConfig, validate})` {#validateThemeConfig}

segments.source_content: Return validated and normalized configuration for the theme.

translations.zh-hant: 返回經過驗證和標準化的主題配置。

segments.source_content: ### `themeConfig` {#themeConfig}

translations.zh-hant: ### `themeConfig` {#themeConfig}

segments.source_content: `validateThemeConfig` is called with `themeConfig` provided in `docusaurus.config.js` for validation and normalization.

translations.zh-hant: `validateThemeConfig` 會接收 `docusaurus.config.js` 中提供的 `themeConfig` 進行驗證和標準化。

segments.source_content: ### `validate` {#validate-1}

translations.zh-hant: ### `validate` {#validate-1}

segments.source_content: `validateThemeConfig` is called with `validate` function which takes a **[Joi](https://www.npmjs.com/package/joi)** schema and `themeConfig` as the arguments, returns validated and normalized options. `validate` will automatically handle error and validation config.

translations.zh-hant: `validateThemeConfig` 會接收 `validate` 函數，該函數接受 **[Joi](https://www.npmjs.com/package/joi)** 模式和 `themeConfig` 作為參數，返回經過驗證和標準化的選項。`validate` 會自動處理錯誤和驗證配置。

segments.source_content:
:::tip

[Joi](https://www.npmjs.com/package/joi) is recommended for validation and normalization of theme config.

To avoid mixing Joi versions, use `const {Joi} = require("@docusaurus/utils-validation")`

:::

translations.zh-hant:
:::tip

推薦使用 [Joi](https://www.npmjs.com/package/joi) 進行主題配置的驗證和標準化。

為避免混用 Joi 版本，請使用 `const {Joi} = require("@docusaurus/utils-validation")`

:::

segments.source_content: If you don't use **[Joi](https://www.npmjs.com/package/joi)** for validation you can throw an Error in case of invalid options.

translations.zh-hant: 如果您不使用 **[Joi](https://www.npmjs.com/package/joi)** 進行驗證，可以在選項無效時拋出錯誤。
@@untranslatable_placeholder_f6563256

segments.source_content: In TypeScript, you can also choose to export this as a separate named export.

translations.zh-hant: 在 TypeScript 中，您也可以選擇將其作為單獨的命名導出。
@@untranslatable_placeholder_c9873cf8
